Html:
Hey there,

first of all I'd like to thank and congratulate you for your awesome work with D3.

I'm searching for a way to be able to define user specific tick parameters like major tick count, start value, minor tick count, number of intervals (steps). Any hint concerning that?

Thanks very much!

Alex

There are a couple of discussions that may help, "Manual Grid Lines & Tick Marks" & "Adjust Spacing of Tick Marks".

Have you looked at the sample DevSamples\AxesApp in the nightly build?
I already knew these discussion but couldn't get that much out of it. But I didn't know about the dev-samples which were very helpful. Thank you very much ;)
